Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time between 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' for re-submission
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Average time for 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' to be followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' to next 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time it takes from 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average waiting time to 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' after 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total time it takes 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' to be followed by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' in cases leading to successful payment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and activity Payment Handled for cases where activity Payment Handled occurs

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' to 'Payment Handled' in cases where re-submission occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time for all activities following 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' until 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time for 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' in variants leading to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum time between 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and any re-approval activity
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time it takes for a case to be closed after 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' in variants where it directly leads to case closure
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'
